reviewText: I am so glad to have Gilad's workouts in my collection! This workout combines a variety of excercises (mostly cardio) from several of his videos. Gilad's fun and motivating nature really made me feel excited to keep going. By the end of the workout, I feel exhilerated! For a great overall cardio and toning workout, Gilad is a must-have!!

reviewText: I really love this new DVD as I am struggling to take off the 'last 10lbs'. Those truly are the hardest to take off. This DVD has helped by mixing low and high aerobics and it is fun. The only negative are the ridiculous 80's exercise garb. I try not to look when some of the outfits are downright horrible. Otherwise I enjoy Gilad's manner of discipline and humor.

reviewText: This is one of my favorite workout videos, mostly because of the power aerobics. You really get your heart rate up and sweat, and you can modify the moves to make it more or less intense. Some have criticized the short breaks between segments because you lose your momentum, but who's stopping you from running in place during those short breaks?I should add that this is one of the toughest workout videos I own, and I have about 20 of them. You need alot of time to do it, but you really see results fast. I have nice abs and got rid of my flabby arms thanks to this video. Also all my clothes are loose since I've been doing this video regularly. I usually do this video 2-3 times a week, then less intense videos on other days, and run or bike on the weekends. Anyway, it's given me confidence, a slim figure, and cardiac endurance. I couldn't finish this video when I first got it, but now I can go start to finish without stopping, and sometimes I run in place when the people on the video are just marching.The moves are '80's inspired for sure, but getting a tough cardiac workout is just what chubby Americans need, even if it's out of style.

reviewText: It you want a good workout that is a complete body workout, then this DVD is for you.  This guy just produces one amazing DVD after another.  Once you start using his videos you will be back buying more.  He keeps you motivated and explains things to you very clearly.  I definitely recommend this one also!  It is a must have for those of you that want to keep in shape!

reviewText: I worked out to Bodies In Motion 20 years ago after the birth of my son and I lost 20 lbs in about three months.  His workouts are no-nonsense and he is soooo motivating, its infectious.  I fell off the wagon for a little while, but his bootcamp style is just what I need to whip myself into shape. Keep it up Gilad because you have a fan for life.

reviewText: I bought this DVD because I was looking for something a little more challenging than the aerobic videos and DVD's I have.  I do find it more challenging, however, its extremely hokey.  I have a high tolerance for hokey workout videos.  They are all somewhat hokey, but I had a hard time tolerating some of this.  At one point, he has girls in tight spandex working out with him on the deck of a ship and they are wearing captains caps!  Fortunately, this seciton is short and easy to skip.  It is challenging with running and kicking sections included.  If you need something challenging and don't mind a lot of girls in tight spandex, you might like this workout.

reviewText: If you are a Gilad fan, you will really enjoy this DVD. There is so much variety here--you get cardio, toning, abs, warm-up, cool-down and everything is programmable. Gilad is known for his simple but very effective workouts. You will get a compilation of some of his best from the 80's-90's. Also, if you are a fan of simple aerobics, this is for you. Everything here is so deliciously 80's..I LOVE IT! There is even a part where Gilad and the girls are working out on a ship deck and they are wearing sailor hats! It made me laugh :) Although its old school, these exercises will get you results.
Title: N/A

reviewText: When i was a teen in the 90s i used to workout to Gilad on ESPN-Bodies in Motion....I did have this on VHS about 10 years ago and loved this workout, for the past few years i have been working out with the newest DVD trainers,, i find my knees and back have taken a toll working out with jillian michaels--though i do love some of her workouts,, i feel alot of injury results in using some of her workout.. So i decided to buy this, havent done this workout in 10 years,, it was like visiting an old friend you loved. I knew it was a great workout but forgot the exercises,, all came back to me, even the dialogue "your right, your wrong". :) Really great workout, he gives you a long warm up, which is great, feels good,the cardio is hard but does not put alot of strain on the knees. Gilad is fun to work out to, hes very motivating. He goes slow when showing a move and is always reminding you of proper form. The cool down is long and great as well..I will be buying more of Gilads, dvds, wow i forgot how great he is.

reviewText: Sono diventata appassionata di allenamenti Gilad, lo faccio quasi tutti i giorni e mi piace tantissimo sto ottenendo grandissimi risultati. il posto è da sogno e lui è meraviglioso, mi tiene in piacevole compagnia per tutto il tempo dell'allenamento... io cammino molto anche con Leslie Sansone ma questo mi da quella spinta in più.. grande musica.... altamente consigliato. Ora che ho scoperto Gilad comprerò tutti i suoi allenamenti sono una grande garanzia di perdita peso....Per me lo sport deve essere anche divertimento e questo per me lo è. Grazie Gilad.

reviewText: This is a great series to start and end with. I wish the warm up was more indepth. I have a compound fracture in my left leg and a breast size that makes it hard to do some of the high impact aerobics. This workout helps me become more confident. I can tell I'm getting better when I know i don't have to take a 'breather'.
